title: UPDATE: Dog shot by Winnebago County Sheriff's deputy, another deputy grazed by bullet
content:
ROCKFORD (WREX) -
UPDATE: 13 WREX has learned a dog that was shot after attacking a Winnebago County officer is dead.
Officials say they were serving a warrant at a house on Sunset Avenue and Auburn Street. When officers went inside, they say a pit bull broke out of its cage and attacked one of them. Another officer shot the dog and in the process a bullet grazed a deputy. We're told that deputy is OK.
They're still looking for the person wanted on the warrant.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A dog is shot by Winnebago County deputies today during a warrant check.
It happened at a home on Sunset Avenue and Auburn Street.
The Sheriff's Office says it was doing a saturation detail today and went in to the house for a warrant check.
Once inside, they say a dog broke out of its cage and attacked an office.
Another officer shot the dog, and in the process a bullet grazed a deputy. We're told that deputy is OK.
The Sheriff's Office could not confirm the dog was killed.
The shooting is under investigation.
